entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Richmond
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:11 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.0°C

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or periods of rain changing to periods of rain this evening. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia early in the evening. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
